review: Got the injection in gluteus Maximus on Tuesday, Oct 30, 2018... immediately felt like I could breathe better.  Next day had really bad jitters, flushing in my face and unable to sleep. After that started having pain in my neck and arm on left side, stomach felt like it was tight and going to burst... 5 days later still feeling very jittery/shaky on the inside and very tired... will NEVER be getting this again... hopefully the side effects subside
